post.author: jimi_hendrix
post.body:
Hi Everybody, what do i have to do to get the base_floor/sflgrate2.tga texture
streched "correctly" to that trapezoidal element in 3dMax.



http://home.arcor.de/jimi333/800x60_2.jpg

I tried to do it by using the unwrap_UVW modifier, but that did lead to nothing.

post.author: zenarion
post.body: Position the said element exactly the same way as the others are. This should fix your problem.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: You might also want to turn on texture correction for the perspective viewport like the image below. I made a screenshot for you. This helps with further aligning textures.

post.author: jimi_hendrix
post.body: Hey thanks a lot! i think that will do it for the moment.
